stable.readmeMarkdown:
# Xibe AI 1.2.3 (Stable)

- Complete app rebrand to Xibe AI
- MCP tools integration
- Enhanced Agent-MCP mode
- Share preview option
- Universal thinking support
- All Pro features are now free!

Visit the download page for installers.
stable.updateNotice: Important: If macOS Gatekeeper warns, right-click the app and choose Open.
updateInfo: All Pro features unlocked for free

beta.readmeMarkdown:
# Xibe AI 1.2.3 (Beta)

- Same as Stable but with experimental fixes
- Early access to patches before stable rollout

Use the Beta download page for OS-specific installers.
beta.updateNotice: Note: Beta builds may contain experimental changes.
